div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2316 Campo de Rebate, near Orihuela, 50 km. SW of Alicante, 1850 Burial: 4th cent. B.C.? (Jenkins) Contents: 67 AE Unc.: 24 (incl. 1 inscribed ΕΝ) Flans: 43 Disposition: Granada Delgado, MAE I, p. clxvii Gomez-Moreno, Miscelaneas (Madrid, 1949), pp. 160-1, illus. Amoros, Numisma 11 (1954), pp. 29-31
